      • getAccessor

        public net.runelite.api.Actor getAccessor()
        Description copied from class: RSCharacter
        Retrieves a reference to the client accessor. For internal use. The reference should be stored in a SoftReference by subclasses to allow for garbage collection when appropriate.
        Returns:
        The client accessor.
